title: The sheepherd's new kalender: or, The citizens & country man's daily companion treating of most things that are useful, profitable, delightful, and advantageous to mankind. Being the thirty years study, and experience, of a learned sheepherd in the west of England.
author: C.P.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by A.M. for J. Blare, at the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge,
